title: Correct me if I'm wrong, but is Bone Plating REMOVED for the sake of Shield Bash?
body: PBE did not mentioned anything about Bone Plating. Yes, I read that "Shield Bash takes place of Bone Plating", but does that mean BP is stripped off of the Rune System rather than it being placed somewhere else?

replies.body: Bone Plating is a defensive rune. Though Shield Bash has "shield" in its name it actually provides 0 defensive stats and only grants damage.
